00047 typedef enum WntConcentrationType_
00048 {
00049     NONE,
00050     LINEAR,
00051     RADIAL
00052 } WntConcentrationType;
00053 
00054 
00058 class WntConcentration
00059 {
00060 private:
00061 
00063     static WntConcentration* mpInstance;
00064 
00066     CancerParameters* mpCancerParams;
00067 
00074     WntConcentrationType mWntType;
00075 
00079     AbstractTissue<2>* mpTissue;
00080 
00084     bool mTypeSet;
00085 
00089     double mConstantWntValueForTesting;
00090 
00095     bool mUseConstantWntValueForTesting;
00096 
00098     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00105     template<class Archive>
00106     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00107     {
00108         mpCancerParams = CancerParameters::Instance();
00109         archive & *mpCancerParams;
00110         archive & mpCancerParams;
00111         archive & mWntType;
00112         archive & mpTissue;
00113         archive & mTypeSet;
00114         archive & mConstantWntValueForTesting;
00115         archive & mUseConstantWntValueForTesting;
00116     }
00117 
00118 protected:
00119 
00123     WntConcentration();
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00133     static WntConcentration* Instance();
00134 
00138     virtual ~WntConcentration();
00139 
00144     static void Destroy();
00145 
00153     double GetWntLevel(double height);
00154 
00163     double GetWntLevel(TissueCell* pCell);
00164 
00171     c_vector<double,2> GetWntGradient(c_vector<double,2> location);
00172 
00180     c_vector<double,2> GetWntGradient(TissueCell* pCell);
00181 
00187     void SetTissue(AbstractTissue<2>& rTissue);
00188 
00192     WntConcentrationType GetType();
00193 
00199     void SetType(WntConcentrationType type);
00200

00208

00221 };
